item.title: Will Someone *Please* Tell Me Whats Going On? (Redux)
item.description: This was a talk I gave at FOSDEM 2020. I had previously given this talk at PyCon Limerick. The summary is repeated below. Software rarely stands still (unless it’s TeX).

item.title: Will Somebody *Please* Tell Me What Is Going On?
item.description: This was a talk I gave at the inaugural PyCon Limerick in March 2019. I explored some tools available within the Python ecosystem that can be used to manage change.
